name: 臺灣小說英譯專題
description: 本課程開設用意在讓學生了解如何分析白先勇的《台北人》，進而從目前己有之《台北人》英譯本學習如英譯的技巧。
goals: 讓學生了解如何分析白先勇的《台北人》，進而了解此書小說之英譯
syllabus:
**白先勇的《臺北人》：翻譯與詮釋**

一、課程介紹

二、[The EternalSnow Beauty (永遠的尹雪豔)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#The_Eternal_Snow_Beauty_(%E6%B0%B8%E9%81%A0%E7%9A%84%E5%B0%B9%E9%9B%AA%E8%B1%94))

三、[A Touch ofGreen (一把青)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#A_Touch_of_Green_(%E4%B8%80%E6%8A%8A%E9%9D%92))

四、[New Year'sEve (歲除)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#New_Year's_Eve_(%E6%AD%B2%E9%99%A4))

五、[The LastNight of Taipan Chin (金大班的最後一夜)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#The_Last_Night_of_Taipan_Chin_(%E9%87%91%E5%A4%A7%E7%8F%AD%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%80%E5%BE%8C%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%9C))

六、[A Sea ofBlood-red Azaleas (那片血一般紅的杜鵑花)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#A_Sea_of_Blood-red_Azaleas_(%E9%82%A3%E7%89%87%E8%A1%80%E4%B8%80%E8%88%AC%E7%B4%85%E7%9A%84%E6%9D%9C%E9%B5%91%E8%8A%B1))

七、[Ode to BygoneDays (思舊賦)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Ode_to_Bygone_Days_(%E6%80%9D%E8%88%8A%E8%B3%A6))

八、[The Dirge ofLiang Fu (梁父吟)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#The_Dirge_of_Liang_Fu_(%E6%A2%81%E7%88%B6%E5%90%9F))

九、[Love's LoneFlower (孤戀花)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Love's_Lone_Flower_(%E5%AD%A4%E6%88%80%E8%8A%B1))

十、[Glory's byBlossom Bridge (花橋榮記)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Glory's_by_Blossom_Bridge_(%E8%8A%B1%E6%A9%8B%E6%A6%AE%E8%A8%98))

十一、[AutumnReveries (秋思)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Autumn_Reveries_(%E7%A7%8B%E6%80%9D))

十二、[A Sky Full ofBright, Twinkling Stars (滿天裏亮晶晶的星星)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#A_Sky_Full_of_Bright,_Twinkling_Stars_(%E6%BB%BF%E5%A4%A9%E8%A3%8F%E4%BA%AE%E6%99%B6%E6%99%B6%E7%9A%84%E6%98%9F%E6%98%9F))

十三、[Wandering inthe Garden, Waking from a Dream (遊園驚夢)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Wandering_in_the_Garden,_Waking_from_a_Dream_(%E9%81%8A%E5%9C%92%E9%A9%9A%E5%A4%A2))

十四、[Winter Night(冬夜)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#Winter_Night_(%E5%86%AC%E5%A4%9C))

十五、[State Funeral(國葬)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taipei_People#State_Funeral_(%E5%9C%8B%E8%91%AC))

十六、結論

methodologies.note: 教師介紹《臺北人》中的小說
學生擇一篇小說細究之
